name: Waffle Tower Defense
description:
Use butter, chocolate, honey, and more to defend your waffle from an onslaught of ants! This game was made by Video Game Development Club for our fall 2018 semester project. 

Hover over towers to view their effects, then click and drag them to place them onto the tiles. Where the ants begin is random, but their path is not. They want to eat the sweetest things on the waffle, and that includes your towers, so place them wisely to guide the ants to exactly where you want them.

I was the project manager and sound team lead for this game.

Main Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/ants-go-marching

VGDC: https://vgdc.umn.edu/
